letters.description: Identify unique symptom clusters, environmental triggers, and the client's current pain baseline.
Implement strategic activity management to stabilize energy levels and prevent the 'boom-bust' cycle.
Establish neuro-supportive sleep hygiene protocols to improve restorative rest and cognitive function.
Develop a gentle, graded physical activity plan tailored to individual tolerance without triggering flares.
Utilize mind-body techniques to down-regulate a sensitized central nervous system and reduce sympathetic dominance.
Foster psychological flexibility and cognitive reframing to improve the client's relationship with chronic pain.
Create a sustainable, long-term lifestyle plan focused on flare prevention and holistic vitality.
